wikipedia_page.main: Caspar Dennis Shankly Hughes (born 9 June 1993) is an English footballer. He plays as a midfielder for Nantwich Town having started his career at Crewe Alexandra.

response: *1 June 2012: The club announce that they will be releasing David Artell, Lee Bell, Carl Martin, Danny Shelley, Jordan Brown, Jason Oswell, Caspar Hughes, Michael Koral, Danny Ting and Jordan Connerton.
